task.title: How to Add Numbers ?
task.shortdesc: Here are the instructions for using the addition feature of ABC calculator app

taskbody.prereq: You must know what is addition to successfully perform this operation.
taskbody.result: The result from the addition is displayed.
taskbody.example: You want to add 2 into 5. The equation will appear as 5+2=7. Enter 5. Press plus. Enter 2. Press Equal. The result 7 appears on the screen.
